name: Planets (dazi77)
description:
Over 7,000 kilometers apart, Finland & Korea are on the same blue planet, where we are born and grow old, and live happily or wait for the next suffering. The distance constructs both our similarities and differences. The distance can be extended to an astronomical unit, and the planet becomes small even if it carries all of our memories. Flying over small planets is a meditation about where to come and where to go since both Finland & Korea are on the blue earth. Driving a propeller plane, it is your challenge to find our planet among those.

From Unity Asset Store

Dark Singularity
